channel.title: Jithin M Das
channel.description: Blog and website of Jithin M Das, blogging mainly for tech. Opinions expressed are mine.

item.title: Aosp Rasp Setup 2
item.description: yout: post title: Getting started with AOSP date: 2017-09-08 16:00:00 description: How to setup development environment on Linux for AOSP (Android Open Source Project) —

item.title: Setup nRF5xx development on Linux
item.description:
Hardware

I use nRF52 Development kit (PCA10040). This is connected to the system through USB cable. It has inbuilt Segger JLink Interface, to flash the program.

item.title: Welcome to { Personal } Jekyll Theme!
item.description: Click the view more posts link bellow, to see the currently available post-tutorials to help you get your { Personal } website up and running quicker!

item.title: Initial setup
item.description: All features of { Personal } are controlled by setting values to variables that are defined in the _config.yml file. Let’s start with the initial variables that you have to set before serving your { Personal } website for the first time.

item.title: Modifying the Header
item.description: The intro part of the index page (Header) is consisted of four elements:

item.title: Web app mode
item.description: You can make your website behave like a native web app in iOS and Android devices by providing links for the icons for each resolution:

item.title: Setting up the Blog
item.description: A website is truly personal if it hosts your blog as well, this place of the internet where you can place your thoughts about anything!

item.title: Adding a life event in the Timeline
item.description: One of the coolest features of { Personal } is that enables you to tell your life’s story in the form of a timeline of photos, dates and text descriptions.
